item.title: Buy the weakness in stocks like Tesla and Palantir as bull market has more room to run, investor says
item.description: Investors can buy the dip on some key tech stocks after this week's market losses, according to Eddie Ghabour, Key Advisors Wealth Management managing...

item.title: Time to snap up Oracle, now down more than 30% in past two months, says Carter Worth
item.description: What the charts are saying about Oracle, according to Carter Worth.

item.title: An analyst worries OpenAI will miss its 'extravagant' spending commitments. These stocks would be the most vulnerable
item.description: D.A. Davidson analyst Gil Luria pointed to a handful of AI stocks at risk if OpenAI proves incapable of following through on its deals.

item.title: Tesla fell after Musk's pay package was approved. How to play the volatility with options
item.description: Jeff Kilburg breaks down this options trade on Tesla after shareholders approved Elon Musk's $1 trillion package.

item.title: Tesla shareholders passed Elon Musk's $1 trillion package. What analysts are saying
item.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk's new $1 trillion pay plan consists of 12 tranches of shares that would be granted if Tesla hits certain milestones.
